page.title: 14HOOK NORTON -RELIGION
page.content: St. Peter's Church is a Norman church built about 900 years ago in the shape of a cross.We sketched the windows which had a story in them. The font is about 700 years old and someone in Hook Norton probably carved it. The carvings include a mixture of ideas from the Bible and Astrology. On the font Eve is holding an apple and a fig leaf.Adam is holding a spade and a rake. Sagitarius is Good,Aquarius is Evil.The story of Noah's Ark is in the Bible. Aries reminds us of the Lamb of God. The Evengelists are Matthew,Luke, John and Mark. The font is used for christening people. It is so big because they used to put babies into it. The cross is on the behalf of God and Jesus. When the baby is baptized the parents and godparents are made to promise to fight evil and to care for the child.
